mapper.insert:
insert into paper
test_id,
admin_id,
select_list,
completion_list,
paper_name,

mapper.update:
update paper
test_id = #{testId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
select_list = #{selectList,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
completion_list = #{completionList,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
paper_name = #{paperName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where paper_id = #{paperId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update paper set test_id = #{testId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, select_list = #{selectList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, completion_list = #{completionList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, paper_name = #{paperName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where paper_id = #{paperId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select count(1) from paper p , admin a , test t where p.admin_id = a.admin_id and t.test_id = p.test_id
and p.paper_name like concat('%',#{paperName}, '%')
